bug.author: qingqing01
bug.summary: Need to keep consistency between GPU and CPU implementation for conv layer.
bug.description: Now the ExpandConvLayer implementation for CPU is not consistency with GPU implementation by cuDNN. This issue is also related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/issues/379>#379</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gangliao>@gangliao</denchmark-link>
Have you started working on this issue? If not, I was just wondering if I could contribute to this one since I recently worked on the convolution codes and one of my co-worker needs this feature soon. thanks

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wangyang59>@wangyang59</denchmark-link> Actually, I did not start this work immediately, because some other docs and bugs need me to fix soon. So if you want to contribute to this one, I am very appreciated it. Thanks.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gangliao>@gangliao</denchmark-link>
Ok, I will take it over then.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/qingqing01>@qingqing01</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/reyoung>@reyoung</denchmark-link>
I have fixed this bug and made the pull <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/pull/636>#636</denchmark-link>
Please help review my code, thanks.
